# Release notes for pkdb_data 1.0.8

We are pleased to release the next version of pkdb_data including the
following changes:

## Data
- updated omeprazol data
- first captopril data
- enalapril data

## Info nodes
- omeprazol, enalapril, captopril

## Dependencies
- updated build and release actions
- updated development dependencies
```
pip-tools>6.10
black>=24.1.1
bump2version>=1.0.1
isort>=5.13.2
tox>=4.12.1
flake8>=6.1.0
flake8-mypy>=17.8.0
mypy>=1.8.0
pytest>=8.0.0
pytest-cov>=4.1.0
```

Your pkdb_data team
